dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Manage your workflows and track progress
dashboard.recentActivityDescription: Track the latest workflow actions and updates
dashboard.myReusableWorkflowsDescription: Workflows you can use multiple times
dashboard.allSavedWorkflowsDescription: Manage all workflow templates in the system and start new workflow instances
dashboard.pendingTasksInfo: Workflow tasks assigned to you will appear here
dashboard.createFirstWorkflow: Create and save your first workflow in the workflow builder
dashboard.reusableWorkflowsInfo: Reusable workflows you can start will appear here
dashboard.welcomeMessage: Workflow features are available to managers and supervisors. Contact your administrator for workflow creation permissions.
dashboard.workflowsMovedDescription: All workflows are now managed in the "Saved Workflows" section.
dashboard.noTasksMessage: You don't have any tasks ready to work on right now. Tasks will appear here when workflows are started and assigned to you.
